title: Meaning & Story Behind Josh Emmett’s Nickname ‘CC0’
description: Josh Emmett is not your typical UFC featherweight contender. Sure, he’s got the heart of a fighter and the mindset of a champion, but there’s more to him than just grit and skill inside the Octagon. Emmett holds a psychology degree and even has a passion for crypto—an unexpected combo that makes him stand out […]The post Meaning & Story Behind Josh Emmett’s Nickname ‘CC0’ appeared first on EssentiallySports.

title: Bitget Secures El Salvador Digital Asset Service Provider (DASP) License After BSP Approval
description: VICTORIA, Seychelles, April 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Bitget, the leading cryptocurrency exchange and Web3 company, has obtained the Digital Asset Service Provider (DASP) license from El Salvador’s National Commission of Digital Assets (CNAD), expanding its regulatory framework within the country. This development comes after the earlier acquisition of the Bitcoin Services Provider (BSP) license […]
